name: António Félix da Costa
introduction: Antnio Maria de Mello Breyner Flix da Costa is a Portuguese racing driver currently competing in Formula E for DS Teechetah. Felix da Costa drove for the Red Bull team at the 2013 Young Drivers Test alongside Carlos Sainz, Jr.  The Portuguese driver has previously driven in the Young Drivers Test for the ForceIndia team in 2010 and Red Bull in 2012. He was still a test driver for the Red Bull team for more years until he left in December 2015.
